overview:
Stacy Ann Kingsley is the Italian Editor & Chief of Bazaar Daily News. She was also the sister of the late co-founder, before his death in 2009.

Kingsley’s job ranges from overseas marketing & promotions, to simply making sure ‘Word of Mouth’ is put into full play for Bazaar Daily News.

Kingsley, to date is the youngest staff member of Bazaar Daily News.
